definitions.definition: feel or cause to feel in need of rest or sleep.
examples: soon the ascent grew steeper and he began to tire
synonyms: droop; Moredeteriorate "he began to tire as the ascent grew steeper"fatigue
wear to a frazzle "the journey had tired her"exhausting
grueling; informalmurderous "it was very tiring work"

definitions.definition: lose interest in; become bored with.
examples: she will stay with him until he tires of her
synonyms: get impatient with; Moreinformalhave had it up to here with
have had enough of "we are tired of your difficult behavior"

definitions.definition: exhaust the patience or interest of; bore.
examples: it tired her that Eddie felt important because he was involved behind the scenes

definitions.definition: a rubber covering, typically inflated or surrounding an inflated inner tube, placed around a wheel to form a flexible contact with the road.
a strengthening band of metal fitted around the rim of a wheel.
